timeline.author: xnull

replies.bodyText: this is an internal setting that should not be tunable but I will expose it anyway, thanks
replies.author: hisundar

replies.bodyText: actually just had a conversation with the folks using this, we feel exposing this to the browser can cause a lot more confusion than help. this is really an internal batching for RocksDB partitions.
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.author: xnull

timeline.bodyText: Can we have a test where the number of entries > batchsize and then verify that the number of partitions is correct and all entries are included in the entryStream api?
timeline.author: pankti-m

replies.bodyText:
this api is using the same parameters as checkpoint writer
I think these good suggestions but are tests we should add to the checkpointer writer probably not here right?
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.message: CorfuStore: Detected changes to protobuf & test upgrade

CorfuStore: Detected changes to protobuf & test upgrade

This is to help QE with their build to build upgrades.
Updating the schema on openTable allows them to migrate to
a new protobuf version without having to redeploy their setups.

timeline.author: WenbinZhu

replies.bodyText:
I kept it as error because it is unsupported at this time and folks should really never see this.
In next release, we can move this to info once a migration path has been established.
Does that sound ok?
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.bodyText: log.error? Is this used when you were debugging and forgot to delete?
timeline.author: WenbinZhu

replies.bodyText: Good catch! thanks - this is from the debugging patch.
replies.author: hisundar

timeline.author: WenbinZhu

replies.bodyText: No, we want this line to be printed out even going forward, since it helps diagnose a tricky deserialization issue, so this is intentional!
replies.author: hisundar

replies.bodyText: Okay, btw can you make it more descriptive?
replies.author: WenbinZhu
